comment: well, that's life in a country.. yep, sure glad we saved the Brits from the nazis so they could let the British Empire go to shit. Why I say now that Canada should have stayed home in '39, sad reality.

      :snt1 (l / life
            :domain (t / that)
            :location (c / country))
      :snt2 (g / glad-02
            :ARG0 (s / save-02
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :mod (c2 / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Britain")))
                  :ARG2 (p2 / person
                        :mod (c3 / country
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Nazism")))
                  :purpose (p3 / possible-01
                        :ARG1 (l2 / let-01
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :ARG1 (g2 / go-08
                                    :ARG1 (e / empire
                                          :mod c2)
                                    :ARG2 (s2 / shit)))))
            :ARG1-of (s3 / sure-02)
            :mod (y / yep))
      :snt3 (c4 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (s4 / say-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
                        :ARG1 (s5 / stay-01
                              :ARG1 (c5 / country
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Canada"))
                              :ARG3 (h / home)
                              :time (d / date-entity
                                    :year 1939)))
                  :time (n4 / now))
            :mod (r2 / reality
                  :ARG1-of (s6 / sad-02))))

comment: Europe would be in better shape had the Germans won. How bad are things in Canada these days? I visit family in Toronto now and then, and it seemed to be absolutely full of Orientals last time. Are they everywhere, or just in that city?
